articles.description: The man has been charged for breaching coronavirus rules after police refused to buy his excuse.
articles.content:
A Sydney man has been charged for breaching coronavirus rules after police refused to buy his excuse.
Officers responding to reports of a group congregating on Carriage Street, in Austral, spotted two men fleeing the scene.
One of the men was caught at a ne… [+1198 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: Facebook launches UK Covid-19 symptom survey - BBC News
articles.description: The social-media giant will ask users about their health in an effort to track the spread of Covid-19.
articles.content:
Image copyrightFacebookImage caption
 The survey asks Facebook users about their health and social distancing
Facebook is to begin asking selected UK users whether they have had symptoms of Covid-19, later on Wednesday.
